job.title: Robotics Engineer
job.description: Job Title Robotics Engineer  Hardware Firmware Engineer brbrSalary 100120K Entry Level college 3 years of experience 120150K Midlevel 46 years of experience 160K for 610 years of experiencebrbrLocation Onsite San Jose for at least the first few months this is a very handson role but can move to more of a hybrid position after a few monthsbrbrTop Reasons to Work with UsbrbrWe are a venturebacked Silicon Valley startup in San Jose CA that revolutionizes the way work is done in warehousing logistics and supply chain with innovative robotic solutionsbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrCandidate will develop and support firmware coding designs that interface to and control analog power and digital circuit boards utilizing embedded microprocessor firmware code written on C The candidate would also support and develop Python scripts for testing and develop and maintain critical safetyrelated firmware developed on specialized Programmable Logic Controllers The candidate would also be heavily involved in hardware designbrbrYou will be a key member of the Hardware team responsible for collaborating crossfunctionally with electrical mechanical firmware and software teams in order to define and develop the embedded firmware to support existing designs and also to evaluate new technologies and features You will be a contributor to the transition of hardware designs from concept through prototype into production The candidate will also develop and support new firmware and hardware features for current and future productsbrbrWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli BS in Electrical Robotics or Computer Engineeringlili 37 years of handson experiencelili Firmware experience required C Clili Solid understanding of scripting languages like Pythonlili Experience with ECAD software desired Eagle Altium or equivalentlili Familiarity with robotics motion control andor PID control systems a plusbrliulWhats In It for YoubrbrMedical dental vision life and ADampDbrbrFlexible time off  work hard amp play hardbrbrAwesome company culture and ability to work with robotsbrbrSo if you are a Hardware Firmware Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrAshleyUpchurchCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  LU11649128  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulAshley Upchurch  Lead Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
